Class ec.cosm.costume.GestureFrame

Class ec.cosm.costume.GestureFrame 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.GestureFrame
public class GestureFrame
extends Object
Class GestureFrame specifies one frame of a motion-and-sound sequence that can be performed by an avatar or other in-world object. GestureFrames are collected into ordered lists by class Gesture.

anchorPointName
Name of the registration point which, together with anchorPointOffset, determines the location of this frame relative to the previous frame.
anchorPointOffset
How far anchorPointName should be moved, in pixels, from its position in the previous frame.
soundURL
Where to locate the sound that begins on this frame of the gesture.

GestureFrame()

addPositionName(String)
removePositionName(String)

soundURL 
  public String soundURL
Where to locate the sound that begins on this frame of the gesture. This is most often null.
anchorPointName 
  public String anchorPointName
Name of the registration point which, together with anchorPointOffset, determines the location of this frame relative to the previous frame.
anchorPointOffset 
  public Point anchorPointOffset
How far anchorPointName should be moved, in pixels, from its position in the previous frame.

GestureFrame 
  public GestureFrame()

  public void addPositionName(String positionName)

  public void removePositionName(String positionName)
